header.title: CosNotifyChannelAdmin_ProxyPushConsumer

erlref.modulesummary: This module implements the OMG CosNotifyChannelAdmin::ProxyPushConsumer interface.

description.p:
To get access to the record definitions for the structures use:
-include_lib("cosNotification/include/*.hrl").
This module also exports the functions described in:

func.name: connect_any_push_supplier(ProxyPushConsumer, PushSupplier) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Connect a supplier to the proxy

desc.p: This operation connects a PushSupplier to the target object. If a connection already exists the AlreadyConnected exception is raised.

func.name: push(ProxyPushConsumer, Event) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Push an Any event to the proxy

desc.p: This operation pushes an #any{} event to the target object. If no client have been connected the Disconnected exception is raised.

func.name: disconnect_push_consumer(ProxyPushConsumer) -> ok
func.fsummary: Close the connection and terminate the proxy

desc.p: Invoking this operation will cause the target object to close the connection and terminate.
